name: One more chance plz
description:
This horror game is about death, where you need to help your doctors  saving your life

In this game you will  play  as a girl called Lisa which is in a coma because of  a car accident

and today she is experiencing death hallucinations

 as she is taking her last breath in a hospital,

Lisa is a bad girl and if she died she will go to hell,

 not sure what  she did, maybe she robbed a bank
:)

so will doctors be able to save Lisa life
and give her a second chance to be a better person or  will  she die ?

The answer depends on you , you need to make Lisa gets out of her  hallucinations to help the doctors saving her life

This is my first game too
